text: Raopura assembly constituency () is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Vadodara district. Mr. Rajendra Trivedi A.K.A Rajubhai Vakil was elected the MLA in the 2017 vidhaansabha elections. He is currently the Speaker of Gujarat Legislative Assembly, he was the minister of sports and games. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments, # Vadodara Taluka (Part) – Vadodara Municipal Corporation (Part) Ward No. – 1, 3, 8, Sama (OG) 14, Chhani (OG) 19. ==Total Number of Voters== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/PCAC.pdf {| class="wikitable" |- ! Election !! Polling Stations !! Male Voters !! Female Voters !! Others !! Total Voters |- | 2014 || 239 || 132117 || 126060 || 17 || 258194 |} ==Member of Legislative Assembly== *2007 - Yogesh Patel, Bharatiya Janata Party *2012 - Rajendra S Trivedi, Bharatiya Janata Party *2017 - Rajendra S Trivedi, Bharatiya Janata Party ==Election results== ===2012=== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/Detail_Report_AC2012.pdf ==References== ==See also== List of constituencies of Gujarat Legislative Assembly Gujarat Legislative Assembly Category:Assembly constituencies of Gujarat Category:Vadodara district
title: Raopura (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
